name: national-parks-spotter
description: This is an application that allows the user to click on a desired National Park and see the list of the campgrounds for that park, and some other useful information about the park.

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../client && npm i --legacy-peer-deps
